mapper.select: SELECT n_No,n_Title,n_Content,n_Hit,n_Regdate,num FROM (SELECT n_No,n_Title,n_Content,n_Hit,n_Regdate,rownum as num FROM (SELECT n_No,n_Title,n_Content,n_Hit,n_Regdate FROM notice_Board ORDER BY n_No DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT n_No,n_Title,n_Content,n_Regdate,n_Hit FROM notice_Board WHERE n_No=#{no}
